name: Practicum in Information Systems
long_desc: This course is offered only at Carnegie Mellons campus in Qatar.  The practicum in information systems allows students interested in applying skills acquired in the field of information systems in the context of a working environment. Students will complete a project and be accountable to a stakeholder that is external to their program of study. They may shadow and observe practices in the field of information systems, and also perform tasks as assigned. A handson experience is expected.  By completing this course, students practice desirable skills for employability, such as time management, project management, team work, and professional development.
